text: The ambience and environment is nice and calming. Service is also very good and the staffs are friendly. I ordered latte and cappuccino, both suited my taste buds. The mushroom soup set also quite nice.

My new favorite brunch spot! The french toast and duck bacon are AMAZING!! Pancakes are good too. Especially loved that they use metal straws. With the decor, service and view, hard to beat this place!

Coffee is quite reasonably priced but the food? In my opinion, nope. It's pricey because of the view? Well, you can have the view for free anyway at the perimeter seatings. But the waitresses are friendly though. All the stars from me are for them ðŸ™Œ

Overall experience is amazing, a good coffee place after dinner with a great view.

Tasteful interior design and friendly staff.
I like the interier design of the cafe especially the venti blocks on the wall. It is located just in front of the marina and the place is really peaceful.
